realms.name: The North
realms.description: Vast, cold, and ancient — where honor and hospitality warm the chill.

properties.name: Winterfell Castle Hotel
properties.shortDescription: Ancient stronghold of House Stark turned luxury hotel
properties.description: Experience the ancient seat of House Stark, now transformed into a luxury resort while maintaining its historic character. Our castle-resort offers a unique blend of medieval atmosphere and modern comfort, featuring authentic Nordic-inspired cuisine, traditional hot spring baths, and activities that bring the rich history of the North to life.

features.description: Luxurious castle accommodations featuring authentic medieval architecture with modern comforts
Multiple dining venues serving Northern cuisine with locally-sourced ingredients
Immersive experiences that bring the North to life

reviews.author: Jon Snow
reviews.comment: Feels just like home. The hot springs are amazing!

reviews.author: Sansa Stark
reviews.comment: Beautiful restoration, maintaining the authentic Northern charm.

realms.name: The Vale
realms.description: High mountains and sky palaces above the clouds.

properties.name: The Eyrie Sky Palace
properties.shortDescription: Sky-high luxury with views of the Vale
properties.description: Perched high among the Mountains of the Moon, the Eyrie Sky Palace offers a serene escape above the clouds. Guests enjoy breathtaking views, crystal-clear air, and elegant stone chambers that blend medieval majesty with modern luxury.
properties.location: Mountains of the Moon, The Vale

features.description: Elegant sky chambers and suites with glass balconies overlooking the Vale
Gourmet mountain cuisine with local herbs and alpine ingredients

reviews.author: Lysa Arryn
reviews.comment: The view is absolutely divine. A bit cold at night but worth every moment.

reviews.author: Petyr Baelish
reviews.comment: A rarefied atmosphere — quite literally. Excellent wine list.

properties.name: Sunspear Beach Resort
properties.description: Bask in the sun-drenched splendor of Dorne at the Sunspear Beach Resort. This seaside palace offers oceanfront villas, Dornish cuisine, and lush water gardens for the perfect balance of relaxation and adventure.

features.description: Beachfront villas inspired by Dornish palaces, complete with private pools and ocean views
Authentic Dornish cuisine featuring local spices, seafood, and wines

reviews.author: Oberyn Martell
reviews.comment: The spice, the sea, the sunsets — everything Dorne stands for.

reviews.author: Ellaria Sand
reviews.comment: The beach villas are divine. Warm nights, even warmer company.
